title: (x) 60s/70s lettering from Snapple commercial ("Gift Shop") - Ed Interlock {David S}
content:
Can anyone help identify the typeface used for the "Gift Shop" sign at around 0:11 in this [Snapple commercial](http://web.archive.org/web/20100304135706/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=LEP4A9448s0)? I've also a screenshot.

Thanks for all your help!
author: Alex Bischoff

comments.content:
Sorry, I guess the attachment didn't make it. Let me try that again.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100304135706im_/http:/typophile.com/files/gift-shop_5391.png)

[**Ed Interlock**](http://web.archive.org/web/20100304135706/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/edbenguiatfonts/viewfonts) from House Industries appears to be a match, though there are others that have come out since that attempt to offer the same look.
